table.name: invoice_li_commercial_data
table.description: Commercial value of this invoice line item.

columns.name: INVOICE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the invoice.

columns.name: LINEITEM_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence number that relates back to the number on INVOICE_LINEITEM.

columns.name: COMMERCIAL_DATA_SEQ_NO
columns.description: Sequence number for the commercial data line.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE
columns.description: The price for the units being shipped.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The unit price currency GID.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE_BASE
columns.description: Unit price in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE_QUALIFIER
columns.description: Qualifier for the unit price.

columns.name: LI_TOTAL_COMMERCIAL_VALUE
columns.description: Line item total commercial value.

columns.name: LI_TOTAL_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The line item total currency GID.

columns.name: LI_TOTAL_BASE
columns.description: Line total in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Unit count.

columns.name: PACKAGING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the packaging unit.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the unit price.

columns.name: UNIT_PRICE_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the currency for the line item unit price functional currency amount.

columns.name: LI_TOTAL_COMM_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the line item total commercial value.

columns.name: LI_TOTAL_COMM_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The GID that qualifies the currency for the line item total commercial value functional currency amount.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
